sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { MatDialogRef } from '@angular/material/dialog'; import { DepartmentDto, EmployeeClient, EmployeeListDto, } from 'src/app/api/app.generated'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-add', templateUrl: './employee-add.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-add.component.css'], }) export class EmployeeAddComponent { addEmployeeForm!: FormGroup; bossSelectOptions: EmployeeListDto[] = []; departmentSelectOptions: DepartmentDto[] = []; constructor( private readonly employeeClient: EmployeeClient, private readonly dialogRef: MatDialogRef, private readonly fb: FormBuilder ) { this.initForm(); } initForm() { this.addEmployeeForm = this.fb.group({ name: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.maxLength(100)]], position: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.maxLength(100)]], phone: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.maxLength(16)]], username: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.maxLength(100)]], password: [ '', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8), Validators.maxLength(20), ], ], bossId: [''], departmentId: ['', [Validators.required]], }); } cancel() { this.dialogRef.close(false); } submitForm() { this.employeeClient .employeePOST({ name: this.addEmployeeForm.controls['name'].value, position: this.addEmployeeForm.controls['abbreviation'].value, phone: this.addEmployeeForm.controls['phone'].value, username: this.addEmployeeForm.controls['username'].value, password: this.addEmployeeForm.controls['password'].value, bossId: this.addEmployeeForm.controls['bossId'].value, departmentId: this.addEmployeeForm.controls['departmentId'].value, }) .subscribe(() => { this.dialogRef.close(true); }); } public errorHandling = (control: string, error: string) => { return this.addEmployeeForm.controls[control].hasError(error); }; }

Add new employee

Username Username is required Username can't be longer than 100 characters Password Password is required Password needs to be at least 8 characters Name Name is required Name can't be longer than 100 characters Position Position is required Position can't be longer than 100 characters Phone Phone is required Phone can't be longer than 16 characters Password Password is required Password needs to be at least 8 characters
